attributes.action: Abolish the rubbish tax scheme, unless they reduce the council tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If they introduce more taxes, will they reduce the council tax, I don't think so,  I thought council tax goes towards the rubbish man wages.  So why bring out a rubbish tax, if the rubbish men done there jobs properly, and also help keep the streets clean, then yes.  But they don't, there the worst for keeping the streets clean.
